text:
Aur bhai khandelwaala (in that tone)!
Sunaya to mereko bhi tha tum uss din par ek aur baat bhi boli thi ki jo humesha yaad rahegi â€œBhai hai tum!â€ kyuki addhe ke baad to koi juth bol sakta nahi (personal experience se bata rha ğŸ˜›). Baki last 2 months mein to apan kaafi maze kiye. Aadha time to badminton mein gaya. NLP mein jab bhi phat jati thi daud kar aate the room ğŸ˜‚. Paar tum hi karaya hai NLP. Apna subah 8 baje tak jagna taki nashta kar paaye, ghanto baith ke sath mein Insta reels dekhna, yaad rahega. Europe trip pe jana to sath le jana meko bhi ğŸ˜›.

P.S. Logo ke â€œdepressing momentsâ€ par unko aise hi support karte raho ğŸ˜‚
P.P.S. 1.5 hrs ki mehnat bhi jaari rakho!! ğŸ˜‚
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text:
Tum acche insaan ho par thora matlabi to sabhi hote hai. Apne bare mein to sab sochte hai.
Pta hia geeta mein tumhare liye alag se shabd hai **!
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text:
Aur Jhantu,
Yaad rakhna ki ye naam maine diya hai. 1st year mein kya hungama karte the raat ko. Yaad hai wo SIS guard aa gya tha ki bhaiya aaplog thik to hai kyuki ajeeb awaze aa rhi aap logo ke room se (talented to hum bachpan se hai) ğŸ˜‚. Jab bhi mann karta hai tumko call lagake sab bata deta hu. Sab bakwaas sun ne ke liye Thanks! Jab IC tha aur Crypto nahi karta tha tab sab dekh liya tha tune. Iske liye thanks bolta par bohot sunaya tha tum to cancel. Yaad hai Goel ke chats padh ke kya haste the humlog ğŸ˜‚! Placement ki treat pending hai abhi bhi. Aur wo PhD wali kaisi hai ab?
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text: Daaru piyega?
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text:
Aur Shukla!
Chowksey kaisi hai? 1st year summer mein jab rommates the tab kya maze kiye the. Itni saari mastt mastt movies dikhaye the tum. Itni mehnat se le gaye the Drams club par continue to kiye nahi hum. Wing mein cricket khelne mein bohot maze aaye. Baki IAS banke bhul mat jana.
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text:
Tumko dekh kar rasta badal lete the jab tum AITS dene aate the ğŸ˜‚. â€œMishra Gangâ€ naam tha tumhare group ka. Aur ek ab ka time dekh lo.. Lockdown tumhare wajah se accha kata relatively. Bokaro Gang se mila diye, sath mein cricket khele, maza aaya. Baki Lockdown mein video calls interesting tumhare wajah se hota tha ğŸ˜‚. Bas ek problem thi ki mere against hi ho jata tha tum. Campus ke 2 mahine apne room se jyada tere room pe bitaye ğŸ˜…. Bohot sikhaye tumko galiyana par sab waste ğŸ˜”! Aur best moment to wo tha jab koi 3 ghanta lagataar sunaya tha tumko par tum haste rhe poore time, ye quality khud ka banaye rakhna aage bhi. Kyuki tum hi bola karte the ki Bokaro ke log to acche hote hi hai ğŸ˜›.
P.S. Apni badminton doubles jodi best hai!!
P.P.S Bhagwat Geeta mein alag se shabd hai tumhare liye- **!! ğŸ˜›
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text:
Tere bagal wale room mein jab aaya tab laga ki chalo itne chapu bande ke sath rahunga mai to hum bhi chapne lagenge. Par tum to sale room par aa ke bas RR karte the. Without any dispute, I (and Goel) can claim that 50% of all RR jo tumne kiya hai wo humare room par tha. Jokes apart kafi sahi time spend kiya hai tere sath. Yaad hai mere controls ke exam ke aadhe ghante pehle aake tere se samjh rahe the concepts ğŸ˜‚. Kyuki pata tha course bhale Aero ka ho par chapu to tum hai hi. Yaad hai 1st year mein ek senior aaya tha mere room par ki Aakash ka room kon sa hai and mai bola tha kon Aakash? ğŸ˜‚. Har koi Bakait ke naam se hi janta. Jaha jaana ye Bakaiti on rakhna!!
P.S. Eligibility to hum directly bhi extend kar dete par tum kabhi directly bole hi nahi!
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text:
!0 din aur ruk jate campus mein to sahi mein dono ko cancer ho jata. Baki respect to tumhare liye hai hi! ğŸ˜‚. Sahi mahol bana dete ho jidhar bhi rehte ho. Mishra ko uss din prove kar hi diya tha ki ice-cream is more injurious to health ğŸ˜‚. Work-from-home from Goa ka plan banao kafi maze aayenge usme.
P.S. Mishra ka marna to hamesha se à¤ªà¤°à¤®à¥‹ à¤§à¤°à¥à¤®à¤ƒ!
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text: Yaar tum unn logo mein se ho jinse instant connect hua tha. Log sahi kehte hai ki log sabse jaldi kambhe pe bond karte hai. H-12 ki almost har party sath mein ki hai. Last party jo ki thi H-12 mein usme sabse jyada maze aaye the.
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text: Hall-12 wali saari parties mein maza aaya bhai tere sath. Bohot nahi mile hum par wo time jo A-308 mein nikala hai maine tum logo ke sath wo yaad rahega. And giutar mere ko hi thora sikha de bhai!
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text:
Areeeeeee!
Bhai Goel, kitni stories hai yaar tere sath to, aur ho bhi kyu na roommate jo ho bhai! First year mein yaad hai wo Geeta wale log and unko tumne ro kar apni CPI batayi thi to wo har room mein bol rha tha ki kya competitive wing hai tumhari! Mere dono roommates chess ke national level players aur mai soch rha tha ki chess mein rating bhi milti hai? Wo tumhare chats jo hum aur Jhantu padhte the, aur wo SIS jo room par aa gaya tha awaze sunke. Baki tera breathless wala video abhi bhi pada hai. Singer to bachpan se hi ho par singing career mein mat jana bhai xD. Baki hum teeno roomates mein sabse jyada dedicated bande tum the bhai humesha se. Chahe padhai ho ya "wo chats". Apne room mein yaad hai wo lights lagai thi aur pehle din hi kharab ho gayi.. Badminton bhi sath khele hai kitna aur volleyball mein single handed shots tere, itna power laate kaha se the. Ab to Bangalore mein milte hai, aaye to tum nahi last 2 months mein. Aur Agra wali mausi ke ghar tere sath jaane wala plan bhi kabhi execute ho nahi paya.
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text: Daaru peena sehat ke liye accha nahi hota..
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text:
Aur PM Bhavesh! (PM = Product Manager)ğŸ˜›
Sath kaam to kiye CoCo time se hi par baat to IC banne ke baad chalu hui. Bohot mails reply kiye hai tumne. Par maza mereko tab aata tha jab Vaibhav group par likhte the ki â€œAaj ke mails unreplied kyu haiâ€ ğŸ˜‚. Bhand hokar jo tum harkate karte the uske liye koi adjective nahi hai mere paas ğŸ¥´. Apni line of thought kafi different thi aur uske wajah se apan bohot lade bhi hai par party humesha sath ki hai A-308 mein. Jo tum bhand hoke gyaan pele the, wo kabhi nahi bhulunga ğŸ˜‚. Baki respect tumhare and Sanket liye badh gayi thi jab tumlog apne placement ka chorr karke SPO ka kaam sambhal rhe the. Ye chiz sayad hi koi campus wala acknowledge kare par maine dekha hai tum dono ko. Aur respect iss liye bhi kyuki mai agar placement mein baith rha hota to sayad hi kuch karta. Mumbai mein kafi maze kiye humne, yaad rahega wo time bhi!
P.S. Mere kafi disaster(s) manage kiye hai tumne ğŸ˜…. Uske liye THANKS (=big thanks). See what I did there! ğŸ˜
P.P.S Apne Pakistani rishtedaro ko mera salam bhejna!
#niche #nuanced #granular_level
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text: Bohot maza aaya tere sath bhai campus aane time to. Ek ek moment uss journey ka lit tha. Mishra ka wo "Girl on Train" group. Usko to mann kiya tha niche fek de train se jab boli ki Aerospace mein job lagta hai? Aur kya masala laga ke sabko kahani sunaya tha uska. Campus mein thora pehle mile hote to aur maze karte sath mein. Bangalore mein uska kasar bhi nikal denge.
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text:
Aur bete!
Pass out hoke Papa ko bhul mat jana ğŸ˜…. Poori family tree yaad hai na? Uss family tree ki photo lena to bhul hi gaye. Aur aaj bhi tera google assistant mereko Papa bolta hai na? Apni bonding sayad tab bohot strong ho gayi thi jab Aero-Mech ke departmental courses chalu ho gaye the. Anindya ke class se aadhe ghante pehle uske HW karte the. MOS to rula hi diya tha. Par mai, tum aur Mugal baith ke jab ghis rhe hote the tab bagal mein baith kar ek banda CS GO khel rha hota tha ğŸ˜‚. Exam ke ek raat pehle baith kar kahaniya sunne ka alag maza tha.  Summers mein cooler mein baith kar India ke matches dekhte the. Tere b**** India ke liye kafi lucky tha if you remember ğŸ˜›. Tera kisi bhi situation mein cool bane rehna is something I really admire. Aise hi bane rehna!
P.S. I love you too..â¤
P.P.S Sameer is mine!!
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text: Bhai Krishna, tere sath kari har party yaad rahega aur har uss party mein tere sath gaya tera favorite song "Sach keh raha hai deewana" bhi yaad rahega. Bohot maze kiye the Placement drive ke time. Jaise hi results aana satrt hota tha tum mastt apni jagah baith kar result sheet update karna chalu kar dete the. Aur 13 December ki epic party bhai yaad rahegi!
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text: Apni baat to 2nd year mein hi start hui jab tere sath wale room mein aaye the. Bohot khele hai tere sath badminton aur volleyball â¤. Last 2 mahine mein to court pe jaake khelne mein to aur bhi maza aaya. Apna 2nd year ka debate yaad hai -If true love exists? Tum for the aur hum against ğŸ˜›. Yaad hai Cisco ke time tum ghari utar diya tha. Mastt reasoning tha uska bhi ğŸ˜‚. Jab ek particular reason se thora low feel karte the, tere paas aake sab bata dete the tumko. Itna patiently mera bakwaas sunne ke liye THANKS! Meri baat sunke apne life se example dete the ki dekh aisa hua tha mere sath bhi. Tum hi the wing mein jo connect karta tha uss topic par mere se. Ek mastt baat hai tere mein ki sabko sath leke chalte ho, aise bohot log hote nahi hai.
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text:
Yaad hai, 10 baje aaye the ki code karde 12 baje deadline hai ğŸ˜‚. Yahi se start hui thi baate. Uss din ke baad se Mishra movie dekhta tha aur hum baate karte the.Tera Mishra ko bolna ki â€œMishra earphones laga leâ€ jab bhi Mishra bolta tha humko bhi bataye ğŸ˜‚. Apni high-level committee yaad hai- Tum, Rishu, Shashank aur mai. Lockdown mein to kitne video calls kare honge. Sayad hi koi din hoga jab video call na hua ho. Life ki 1-1 chiz discuss kar chuke the. Messenger group ka naam hamesha yaad rahega ğŸ˜›. Uss group ka content to kya hi bole. Dekho kabhi kabhi jab tum cooler mein so rahe hote ho to sardi lag jati hai achanak se bhi, usko kuch aur samajh liye the tum ğŸ˜¡. Patna wali trip ke to alag maze the. 2 din ka hi tha par maze aaye paidal ghumne mein (Thanks to Mukesh jiske liye har location bagal mein hi hota tha). GK Quiz yaad rahega. Mountbaten ki dusri shadi kab hui thi- 14 May 1935. Saale uske reception mein gaye the kya tum dono? ğŸ˜‚ Aur jo Mukesh ne artificial baarish karayi thi, train hi chutt jati. Last ke 50 din college ke kya hi the bhai. Sab kuch kiya padhai ke alawa. ğŸ¶Wo din bhi kya din the. ğŸ¶ 4  baje uthte hi Mishra ke room, fir H-13 mein khana, uske baad raat mein ghumna, raat bhar Mafia/patte/carrom. D-Mid wali chatt par ghumte hue gaane sun na, badminton, football, ek ek moment yaad rahega ğŸ˜‡. Jindagi mein nayi chize try karte rehni chaiye kyuki â€œAb to acche log bhi peene lage haiâ€ ğŸ˜›. Omegle pe tum jab â€œHey, Hiâ€ bolte the, uss accent mein tab ka to kya hi bole. Video call to chalu rahega hi even after tumlog Hyderabad chale jao.
P.S. Maggi aur chai to apan world-class banate hi hai I know. 
P.P.S Baki IPL chalta to jeet MI ki hi hoti. Udhar tera luck nahi chalega, samjha.
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text: Itna accha memoir likhne ke liye "PYAAR SE THANK YOU"
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text: Hum Aerospace branch mein the and IC bhi ban chuke the par tumse baat karna thora late start hua par jab start hua uske baad there was no going back. Mujhe bigadne mein sabse BADA haath tumhara hai campus mein. Pehli Bacardi (Green Apple) yaad hai? Aur jab hum peekar cycle se paan lane gaye the aur baar baar gir rhe the ğŸ˜‚.. Itni saari parties ki A-308 Hall 12 mein ğŸ˜Œ. Aur parties mein wo gaane gana uske baad poore campus ka atleast 4-5 round lagana. SPO ki maggi and coffee ğŸ˜‚. Aur Corona ke bich mein tera plan ki Mumbai aajao. Wo 2 mahine Mumbai mein kaafi acche rahi. Kaash tum Bangalore aa jaate, kafi maze aate. Thora dukh iss baat ka rahega ki OPC tenure apna ghar mein rehkar kat gaya.
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey

text:
Mulakaat apni Mukesh ke through hui thi sayad. Accha hua mila diya nahi to Aero ka ek bhi course paar nahi hota. Itna acche bacche the jab aaye the, bigaad ke rakh diya. Yaad hai subah 4 baje propulsion ki class jane ka soch ke sote the aur 8 baje call pe decide karte the ki thandh hai, aaj rehne do. Aur tumhare jugaad ka to kya hi kehna. Assignment, labs kabhi khud se nahi kiye. MATLAB to aaj tak install bhi nahi kiye, jane kitne course nikal gaye (special mention: Rohit Saini). Aur apna glider ko udane ka jugaad yaad hai na? 

Baki koi bhi advise ho, tumse jarur lete theğŸ˜‚. Itna gyaan bhandaar jo hai. Chemical bonding ka asli concept to tum hi sikhaya. Hall 12 ki saari parties mein tumhari shayri pe waah waah karna, saath mein besuro jaisa gaana, kutto ki tarah nachna ğŸ˜‚. Favorite shayri meri "Kaash" hai. Lockdown mein har 2-3 din mein shayri bhejte rehte the. Collect karke rakhe hai sab. Aage Bangalore mein kaam aayega ğŸ˜›. Patna trip ka to ek ek moment yaad rahega (special mention: GK quiz, baarish, aur chai-). Agar humko aage kabhi cancer hua to uske jimmedaar tum hoge ğŸ˜‚. Aadha kaam kharab mera to teri shayri aur playlist ne kari thi ğŸ˜›. Baki 15 July ko dekhte hai apni 10k wali shart ka result. 

P.S. Swaha ka sapna to swaha ho gaya! ğŸ˜‚
P.P.S. T-shirt sambhal ke rakhna meri. Wapas chaiye!
author: Himanshu Gautam Pandey
